TITLE: U.S. proposes lighter sanctions on Russia as part of peace plan with Ukraine: Bloomberg
SUMMARY: U.S. proposals for ending the war were shared in Paris on Thursday, according to Bloomberg.

TITLE: Trump has talked to former Fed Governor Kevin Warsh about firing Powell, report says
SUMMARY: Powell critic Sen. Elizabeth Warren, D-Mass., recently warned that Trump destroying the Fed's independence would spell catastrophe for U.S. markets.

TITLE: Trump administration threatens to bar Harvard from enrolling foreign students
SUMMARY: Noem's letter is the latest example of President Donald Trump's administration making demands of Harvard and other top schools while threatening their funding.

TITLE: Markets will 'crash' if Trump has the power to fire Fed's Powell, Sen. Elizabeth Warren says
SUMMARY: Warren, a frequent critic of Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell, spoke after Trump wrote on social media that Powell's "termination cannot come fast enough!"

TITLE: Trump's tariffs are 'inviting corruption,' Democrats tell Bessent, Lutnick
SUMMARY: The letter led by Sen. Elizabeth Warren underscores a growing attack line as Democratic lawmakers mount their resistance to President Trump's second term.

TITLE: Judge finds probable cause to hold Trump administration in criminal contempt in deportation flights case
SUMMARY: It's the latest legal development in response to the Trump administration's efforts to implement widespread deportations.

TITLE: California suing Trump to stop his 'unlawful' tariffs
SUMMARY: Trump's tariffs have whipped up historic market volatility and frayed America's relationships with its allies and trading partners.

TITLE: The European Union braces for more U.S. tariffs despite talks
SUMMARY: It's been an intense back-and-forth over the past few months, with Trump accusing the EU of being among the worst culprits in its trade treatment of the U.S.

TITLE: 20,000 IRS employees interested in deferred resignation offer as tax deadline looms
SUMMARY: The Trump administration has offered buyouts across the government in a bid to dramatically shrink the size of the federal workforce.

TITLE: AOC fundraising soars as the New York rep and Bernie Sanders barnstorm U.S. against Trump
SUMMARY: Rep. Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez has become a leading face of the Democratic Party's resistance to the Trump administration, drawing crowds nationwide.

TITLE: Trump 'looking into' legality of deporting U.S. citizens to foreign prisons, White House says
SUMMARY: The Trump administration has already deported hundreds of alleged members of a Venezuelan gang from the U.S. to El Salvador, where they are in prison.

TITLE: Trump is 'shredding' credibility with allies while China benefits, former national security advisor John Bolton says
SUMMARY: "We're having a war with our friends and really crippling our ability to deal effectively with China," Bolton told CNBC.

TITLE: Singapore announces general election on May 3, dissolves parliament
SUMMARY: This will be Singapore's 14th general election since independence, and will be Wong's first general election as prime minister.

TITLE: U.S. businesses sue to block Trump tariffs, say trade deficits are not an emergency
SUMMARY: The Trump administration's argument is undercut by its imposing tariffs on countries the U.S. does not have a trade deficit with, the plaintiffs say.

TITLE: DOJ charges man in arson attacks on Tesla showroom, Republican HQ in New Mexico
SUMMARY: Tesla has become a target as CEO Elon Musk has courted controversy for his oversight of President Donald Trump's government-slashing DOGE initiative.

TITLE: Harvard has $2.2 billion in grants frozen by Trump administration after rejecting demands
SUMMARY: The Trump administration has zeroed in on colleges in a crackdown on diversity, equity and inclusion programs in the United States.

TITLE: Trump administration says it lacks authority to get Abrego Garcia back from El Salvador
SUMMARY: A federal judge has ordered the Trump administration to provide daily updates on efforts to recover Kilmar Abrego Garcia from an El Salvador prison.

TITLE: Trump aide Hassett says U.S. got 'amazing' tariff deal offers, recession '100% not' happening
SUMMARY: President Donald Trump has announced a pause in reciprocal tariffs and a waiver for certain electronics items since unveiling his new trade policy.

TITLE: Why Trump's nuclear talks with Iran could be far more successful than Biden's
SUMMARY: "The Iranians are, I think, a little bit more desperate than they were in 2022, and they are faced with a very weak economy," one analyst told CNBC.

TITLE: Trump, top aides fuel tariff confusion by questioning reciprocal exemptions
SUMMARY: Financial markets have been whipsawed as the Trump administration alters its tariff plans.

TITLE: China urges Trump to correct mistakes and heed 'rational voices' on reciprocal tariffs
SUMMARY: China's Commerce Ministry called tariff exemptions a "small step" but urged the U.S. to "completely abolish" reciprocal tariffs.

TITLE: Trump exempts phones, computers, chips from new tariffs
SUMMARY: Financial markets have been roiled since President Trump imposed stiff tariffs on China, where Apple and other tech companies make many of their products.

TITLE: DOJ fires longtime spokesman who worked on Trump investigations
SUMMARY: Robert Mueller and Jack Smith investigated Trump for the DOJ on questions of obstruction of justice, election interference and retention of classified records.

TITLE: Luigi Mangione defense asks judge to block death penalty in CEO murder case
SUMMARY: Mangione is charged with fatally shooting UnitedHealthcare CEO Brian Thompson on a New York City street in December.

TITLE: Trump says 5 more law firms will provide $600 million total in free legal work for causes he supports
SUMMARY: Trump said all five firms also agreed not to "engage in illegal DEI discrimination and preferences" and commit to "Merit-Based Hiring" as part of the deals.

TITLE: Judge orders daily updates from Trump admin on getting Abrego Garcia back from El Salvador
SUMMARY: Kilmar Abrego Garcia was deported from the United States last month as the result of what prosecutors say was an administrative error.

TITLE: Senate Democrats ask SEC to probe Trump and others for potential market manipulation in tariff pause
SUMMARY: The request comes as stock markets are experiencing high volatility as a result of Trump's tariff policy.

TITLE: Trump advisor Peter Navarro hypes stocks a day after calling tariff-driven plunge 'no big deal'
SUMMARY: The S&P 500 is down more than 12% since President Donald Trump reentered the White House and launched a trade war with China.

TITLE: Why Trump's tariffs won't push China and Europe closer
SUMMARY: China and the European Union are unlikely to become close allies even as relations between the EU and the White House could sour.

TITLE: Supreme Court rules U.S. must facilitate return of Kilmar Abrego Garcia from El Salvador
SUMMARY: The Trump administration argues that Kilmar Abrego Garcia is a member of the notorious MS-13 gang. The El Salvador native denies that claim.
